render-list works!

Item List

  • {{ item.title }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ItemService } from '../item.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-render-list', templateUrl: './render-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./render-list.component.css'] }) export class RenderListComponent implements OnInit { items: any[] = []; constructor(private itemService: ItemService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.itemService.getItems().subscribe(data => { this.items = data; }); } }
